00030 #define SQR(x) ((x)*(x))
00031 #define CUB(x) ((x)*(x)*(x))
00032 
00033 
00034 double linear[1][3] = {{ 0., 0., 1.}};
00035 
00036 double tetrahedron[4][3] = {{0., 0., 1.}, 
00037                             {0., 0.942809, -0.333333}, 
00038                             {-0.816497, -0.471405, -0.333333}, 
00039                             {0.816497, -0.471405, -0.333333}};
00040 
00041 double octahedron[6][3] = {{0., 0., 1.},
00042                            {1., 0., 0.},
00043                            {0., 1., 0.},
00044                            {0., 0., -1.},
00045                            {-1., 0., 0.},
00046                            {0, -1., 0.}};
00047 
00048 double cube[8][3] = {{  0.57735,  0.57735,  0.57735},
00049                      {  0.57735,  0.57735, -0.57735},
00050                      {  0.57735, -0.57735,  0.57735},
00051                      {  0.57735, -0.57735, -0.57735},
00052                      { -0.57735,  0.57735,  0.57735},
00053                      { -0.57735,  0.57735, -0.57735},
00054                      { -0.57735, -0.57735,  0.57735},
00055                      { -0.57735, -0.57735, -0.57735}};
00056 
00057 double (*polyhedron[])[3] = { NULL,
00058                               linear,
00059                               NULL,
00060                               NULL,
00061                               tetrahedron,
00062                               NULL,
00063                               octahedron,
00064                               NULL,
00065                               cube };

00069 void initCMintegration(cmintegrationpara* cmpara, const char* projpar)
00070 {
00071   char projparcpy[strlen(projpar)];
00072   strcpy(projparcpy, projpar);
00073   char* c = projparcpy;
00074 
00075   // default is CMNone
00076   cmpara->type = CMNone;
00077   cmpara->n = 1;
00078 
00079   c = strtok(c, "-");
00080   while (c && strncmp(c, "cm", 2)) { 
00081     c=strtok(NULL, "-"); 
00082   };
00083   
00084   if (c) {
00085     c=strtok(NULL, "-");
00086     if (!strncmp(c, "none", 4)) {
00087       cmpara->type = CMNone;
00088       cmpara->n = 1;
00089     } else if (!strncmp(c, "simple", 6)) {
00090       cmpara->type = CMSimple;
00091       cmpara->n = 1;
00092     } else {
00093       int nr = atoi(c);
00094       c=strtok(NULL, "-");
00095       if (!strncmp(c, "tet", 3)) {
00096         cmpara->type = CMPoly;
00097         cmpara->poly.nr = nr;
00098         cmpara->poly.npoly = 4;
00099         cmpara->n = 4*nr;
00100       } else if (!strncmp(c, "oct", 3)) {
00101         cmpara->type = CMPoly;
00102         cmpara->poly.nr = nr;
00103         cmpara->poly.npoly = 6;
00104         cmpara->n = 6*nr;
00105       } else if (!strncmp(c, "cbe", 3)) {
00106         cmpara->type = CMPoly;
00107         cmpara->poly.nr = nr;
00108         cmpara->poly.npoly = 8;
00109         cmpara->n = 8*nr;
00110       } else {
00111         cmpara->type = CMProd;
00112         cmpara->prod.nr = nr;
00113         cmpara->prod.ntheta = atoi(c);
00114         c = strtok(NULL, "-");
00115         cmpara->prod.nphi = atoi(c);
00116         cmpara->n = nr*cmpara->prod.ntheta*cmpara->prod.nphi;
00117       }
00118     }
00119   }
00120 
00121   cmpara->x = malloc(3*cmpara->n*sizeof(double));
00122   cmpara->w = malloc(cmpara->n*sizeof(double));
00123 
00124   return 0;
00125 }

00127 
00128 double _estimateacm(const SlaterDet* Q)
00129 {
00130   // do we have to initialize workspace first ?
00131   // if (X.Gaux == NULL)
00132   //   initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00133 
00134   SlaterDetAux X;
00135   initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00136 
00137   double tcm;
00138 
00139   calcSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00140   calcTCM(Q, &X, &tcm);
00141   freeSlaterDetAux(&X);
00142   
00143   return (0.75/(tcm*(mproton*Q->Z+mneutron*Q->N)));
00144 }

00146 
00147 void _initcmintegration(const Projection* P, 
00148                         double alpha,
00149                         cmintegrationpara* par)
00150 {
00151   if (P->cm == CMNone) {
00152     par->n = 1;
00153     par->x = malloc(3*sizeof(double));
00154     par->w = malloc(1*sizeof(double));
00155     par->x[0][0] = 0.0; par->x[0][1] = 0.0; par->x[0][2] = 0.0; 
00156     par->w[0] = 1.0;
00157   } 
00158 
00159   else if (P->cm == CMSimple) {
00160     par->n = 1;
00161     par->x = malloc(3*sizeof(double));
00162     par->w = malloc(1*sizeof(double));
00163     par->x[0][0] = 0.0; par->x[0][1] = 0.0; par->x[0][2] = 0.0; 
00164     par->w[0] = 0.125*pow(M_PI*alpha,-1.5);
00165   }
00166 
00167   else if (P->cm == CMProd) {
00168     int nr=P->cmprod.nr; 
00169     int nx=P->cmprod.ntheta; int nphi=P->cmprod.nphi;
00170     
00171     double pointr[nr], weightr[nr];
00172     GaussSqrHermitePoints(nr, alpha, pointr, weightr);
00173 
00174     double pointx[nx], weightx[nx];
00175     GaussLegendrePoints(nx, -1.0, 1.0, pointx, weightx);
00176 
00177     double pointphi[nphi], weightphi[nphi];
00178     ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(nphi, 0, 2*M_PI, 0.00,
00179                                      pointphi, weightphi);
00180 
00181     par->n = nr*nx*nphi;
00182     par->x = malloc(3*par->n*sizeof(double));
00183     par->w = malloc(par->n*sizeof(double));
00184 
00185     int i=0;
00186     int ir, ix, iphi;
00187     for (ir=0; ir<nr; ir++)
00188       for (ix=0; ix<nx; ix++)
00189         for (iphi=0; iphi<nphi; iphi++) {
00190           par->x[i][0] = pointr[ir]*sqrt(1-SQR(pointx[ix]))*cos(pointphi[iphi]);
00191           par->x[i][1] = pointr[ir]*sqrt(1-SQR(pointx[ix]))*sin(pointphi[iphi]);
00192           par->x[i][2] = pointr[ir]*pointx[ix];
00193           par->w[i] = 1/CUB(2*M_PI)*
00194             weightr[ir]*weightx[ix]*weightphi[iphi];
00195           i++;
00196         }
00197   }
00198 
00199   else if (P->cm == CMPoly) {
00200     int nr=P->cmpoly.nr; 
00201     int npoly=P->cmpoly.npoly;
00202     
00203     double pointr[nr], weightr[nr];
00204     GaussSqrHermitePoints(nr, alpha, pointr, weightr);
00205 
00206     par->n = nr*npoly;
00207     par->x = malloc(3*par->n*sizeof(double));
00208     par->w = malloc(par->n*sizeof(double));
00209 
00210     int i=0;    
00211     int ir, ipoly, j;   
00212     for (ir=0; ir<nr; ir++)
00213       for (ipoly=0; ipoly<npoly; ipoly++) {
00214         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00215           par->x[i][j] = pointr[ir]*polyhedron[npoly][ipoly][j];
00216         par->w[i] = 1/CUB(2*M_PI)*
00217           weightr[ir]*(4*M_PI/npoly);
00218         i++;
00219       }
00220   }
00221 }

00223 
00224 void initcmintegration(const Projection* P, 
00225                        const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00226                        cmintegrationpara* par)
00227 {
00228   alpha = 0.5/(_estimateacm(Q)+_estimateacm(Qp));
00229 
00230   _initcmintegration(P, alpha, par);
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00234 void reinitcmintegration(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00235                          cmintegrationpara* par)
00236 {
00237   alpha = 0.5/(_estimateacm(Q)+_estimateacm(Qp));
00238 
00239   if (par->type == CMNone) {
00240     par->w[0] = 1.0;
00241     par->x[0][0] = 0.0; par->x[0][1] = 0.0; par->x[0][2] = 0.0; 
00242   } 
00243 
00244   else if (par->type == CMSimple) {
00245     par->w[0] = 0.125*pow(M_PI*alpha,-1.5);
00246     par->x[0][0] = 0.0; par->x[0][1] = 0.0; par->x[0][2] = 0.0; 
00247   }
00248 
00249   else if (par->type == CMProd) {
00250     int nr=par->prod.nr; 
00251     int nx=par->prod.ntheta; int nphi=par->prod.nphi;
00252     
00253     double pointr[nr], weightr[nr];
00254     GaussSqrHermitePoints(nr, alpha, pointr, weightr);
00255 
00256     double pointx[nx], weightx[nx];
00257     GaussLegendrePoints(nx, -1.0, 1.0, pointx, weightx);
00258 
00259     double pointphi[nphi], weightphi[nphi];
00260     ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(nphi, 0, 2*M_PI, 0.00,
00261                                      pointphi, weightphi);
00262 
00263     int i=0;
00264     int ir, ix, iphi;
00265     for (ir=0; ir<nr; ir++)
00266       for (ix=0; ix<nx; ix++)
00267         for (iphi=0; iphi<nphi; iphi++) {
00268           par->x[i][0] = pointr[ir]*sqrt(1-SQR(pointx[ix]))*cos(pointphi[iphi]);
00269           par->x[i][1] = pointr[ir]*sqrt(1-SQR(pointx[ix]))*sin(pointphi[iphi]);
00270           par->x[i][2] = pointr[ir]*pointx[ix];
00271           par->w[i] = 1/CUB(2*M_PI)*
00272             weightr[ir]*weightx[ix]*weightphi[iphi];
00273           i++;
00274         }
00275   }
00276 
00277   else if (par->type == CMPoly) {
00278     int nr=par->poly.nr; 
00279     int npoly=par->poly.npoly;
00280     
00281     double pointr[nr], weightr[nr];
00282     GaussSqrHermitePoints(nr, alpha, pointr, weightr);
00283 
00284     int i=0;    
00285     int ir, ipoly, j;   
00286     for (ir=0; ir<nr; ir++)
00287       for (ipoly=0; ipoly<npoly; ipoly++) {
00288         for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00289           par->x[i][j] = pointr[ir]*polyhedron[npoly][ipoly][j];
00290         par->w[i] = 1/CUB(2*M_PI)*
00291           weightr[ir]*(4*M_PI/npoly);
00292         i++;
00293       }
00294   }  
00295 }

00298 void freecmintegration(cmintegrationpara* par)
00299 {
00300   free(par->x);
00301   free(par->w);
00302 }

00305 void getcmintegrationpoint(int i, const cmintegrationpara* par,
00306                            double x[3], double* w)
00307 {
00308   assert(i < par->n);
00309 
00310   int j;
00311   for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00312     x[j] = par->x[i][j];
00313   
00314   *w = par->w[i];
00315 
00316   // fprintf(stderr, "cm integration point: (%8.5f, %8.5f, %8.5f) weight %8.5f\n", 
00317   //         x[0], x[1], x[2], *w);
00318 }
